sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select djpd_yyjg_hy.khdxdh, djpd_yyjg_hy.bh, djpd_yyjg_hy.djpdmc olddjpdmc, djpd_yyjg_hy.jlbz oldjlbz, djpd_yyjg_hy.jbmc oldjbmc, djpd_yyjg_hy.pdlb oldpdlb, djpd_yyjg_hy.ms oldms, djpd_yyjg_hy.tjrq, khdx_jg.jgdh, khdx_jg.jgmc, khdx_hy.hydh, khdx_hy.hymc, dmms.dmms khzq, djpd_yyjg_hy.pm, djpd_yyjg_hy.dj olddj from djpd_yyjg_hy djpd_yyjg_hy inner join khdx_hy khdx_hy on khdx_hy.khdxdh=djpd_yyjg_hy.khdxdh inner join khdx_jgcy khdx_jgcy on khdx_hy.khdxdh=khdx_jgcy.khdxdh and djpd_yyjg_hy.tjrq between khdx_jgcy.qsrq and khdx_jgcy.jsrq inner join khdx_jg khdx_jg on khdx_jgcy.jgkhdxdh = khdx_jg.khdxdh inner join khdx_hylb hylb on djpd_yyjg_hy.khdxdh=hylb.khdxdh and djpd_yyjg_hy.tjrq between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq inner join csb_dmms dmms on upper(dmms.dmmc) = 'DJPDZQ' and dmms.dmz = djpd_yyjg_hy.pdzq inner join table(fn_getsjjg_java_qxhy($pdrq$, $login_khdxdh$, 0)) qx on qx.khdxdh = khdx_hy.khdxdh where 1=1 and djpd_yyjg_hy.tjrq= $pdrq$ and khdx_hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and djpd_yyjg_hy.djpdmc = '$djpdmc$' order by djpd_yyjg_hy.pm desc,khdx_hy.hydh asc

javascript.edit: jQuery(document).ready(function () { //这里的js脚本，会在页面加载完成后执行 $("#olddjpdmc").attr("disabled",true); $("#jgmc").attr("disabled",true); $("#hymc").attr("disabled",true); $("#oldjbmc").attr("disabled",true); PAS.di.execute('hydjpdtz_getUpdateJlbz',getUpdateJlbzBack); $("#tzdj").executeOnEvent('change','hydjpdtz_getUpdateJlbz',getUpdateJlbzBack); PAS.di.execute('hydjpdtz_getUpdateJbmc',getUpdateJbmcBack); $("#tzdj").executeOnEvent('change','hydjpdtz_getUpdateJbmc',getUpdateJbmcBack); }); //自定义验证，在提交时执行。通过返回true，否则返回false function customValidate(){ if($("#tzyy").val() == ""){ alert("调整原因不能为空！"); return false; } var tzdj = $("#tzdj").val(); if(tzdj==-1) { alert("调整等级不能为空！"); return false; } // 更新等级 var newDj = $("#tzdj").val(); $("#updateDj").val(newDj); // 更新奖励标准 // 更新描述 ：描述+手工调整:从[调整前级别名称]调整到[调整后级别名称]，原因是[调整原因] var oldMs = $("#oldms").val(); var tzyy = $("#tzyy").val(); var oldJbmc = $("#oldjbmc").val(); var newJbmc = $("#updateJbmc").val(); var newMs = ""; newMs = oldMs+"手工调整：从["+oldJbmc+"]调整到["+newJbmc+"],原因是["+tzyy+"]"; $("#oldms").val(newMs); return true; } function getUpdateJlbzBack(obj){ //setOption(); if(obj.data.length>0){ $("#updateJlbz").val(obj.data[0].JLBZ); PAS.di.setDone(obj.sqlid); } } function setOption() { var options = $('#tzdj option'), length =options.length; if(length==0) { setTimeout(function(){setOption()},500); return; } var val =$("#oldjbmc").val(); options.each(function(){ if($(this).html() == val) { $(this).attr("selected",true); } }) } function getUpdateJbmcBack(obj){ if(obj.data.length>0){ $("#updateJbmc").val(obj.data[0].JBMC); PAS.di.setDone(obj.sqlid); } }
